name: Tech Founders Chat
description: Two tech founders discussing the future of AI

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: You know, Priya, AI is evolving faster than we predicted. What excites you most?

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: The democratization of AI tools! Now anyone can build powerful applications without deep technical knowledge.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Absolutely! But we need to ensure ethical guidelines keep pace with the technology.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: That's why our startup focuses on explainable AI - transparency is key to trust.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Smart approach. The future belongs to companies that prioritize both innovation and responsibility.

audioConfig.voiceInstructions: Enthusiastic tech entrepreneur, speaks with passion about technology. Confident and visionary, with occasional excitement in voice when discussing innovation.
Smart and articulate tech founder, speaks with clarity and conviction. Thoughtful pauses when making important points, warm but professional tone.
